newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian castor prices steady in cautious trade.
newsitem.headline: Indian castor prices steady in cautious trade.

text.p: Indian castor December delivery prices were steady on Friday at the reduced level of 1,119/1,120 rupees per quintal in cautious trade, dealers said.
"The maturity period for September delivery is getting closer and operators prefer cautious trading for December delivery too," one dealer said.

Overall volumes remained low and sentiment was subdued on reports of higher arrivals at producing centres. In Gujarat, castorseed arrivals rose to 14,000-15,000 bags (75 kg each) against 7-8,000 bags on Thursday. Groundnut oil was steady at 431/432 rupees per 10 kg on restricted inflows of 40/50 tonnes.
